data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 3, Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Bordeaux.
In the minute 6, Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 8, Saint-Etienne's Adil Aouchiche gets in a shot on goal at Matmut Atlantique. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Enock Kwateng (Bordeaux) has received a first yellow card.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stephanie Frappart signals a throw-in for Bordeaux, close to Saint-Etienne's area.
In the minute 10, Throw-in high up the field for Bordeaux in Bordeaux.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 15, Goal! Saint-Etienne have got their heads in front thanks to a Arnaud Nordin strike.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 17, Stephanie Frappart signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Bordeaux.
Arnaud Nordin of Saint-Etienne gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
In the minute 22, Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Matmut Atlantique.
Denis Bouanga of Saint-Etienne smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 24, Hwang Ui-Jo grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Matmut Atlantique.
Stephanie Frappart signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Denis Bouanga for Saint-Etienne drives towards goal at Matmut Atlantique. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 28, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Denis Bouanga for Saint-Etienne who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Denis Bouanga returns to the field for Saint-Etienne after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 29, Hwang Ui-Jo (Bordeaux) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Saint-Etienne.
In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 30, Bordeaux's Otavio has been booked in Bordeaux.
Can Bordeaux capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
Bordeaux drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Matmut Atlantique, Ryad Boudebouz has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 39, Bordeaux drives forward and Josh Maja gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Saint-Etienne will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Bordeaux.
In the minute 41, Saint-Etienne's Denis Bouanga is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick in a good position for Saint-Etienne!
Saint-Etienne are pushing forward but Ryad Boudebouz's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 42, Stephanie Frappart awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Bordeaux Bordeaux drive forward through Hatem Ben Arfa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 45, At Matmut Atlantique the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Saint-Etienne's Arnaud Nordin breaks free at Matmut Atlantique. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bordeaux close to the penalty box.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne's Arnaud Nordin misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bordeaux.
In the minute 54, Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
Free kick Saint-Etienne.
Youssouf Sabaly for Bordeaux has been booked by Stephanie Frappart and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 55, Saint-Etienne are coming forward and Yvan Neyou gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saint-Etienne needs to be cautious. Bordeaux have an attacking throw-in.
Bordeaux have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 59, Saint-Etienne drive upfield and Adil Aouchiche gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bordeaux defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bordeaux.
Jimmy Briand is on a sub for Josh Maja for Bordeaux.
In the minute 61, The home team replace Toma Basic with Mehdi Zerkane.
Jean-Louis Gasset is making the team's third substitution at Matmut Atlantique with Nicolas De Preville replacing Hwang Ui-Jo.
Bordeaux make their fourth substitution with Maxime Poundje replacing Enock Kwateng.
In the minute 64, At Matmut Atlantique, Bordeaux are penalized for being offside.
The away team have replaced Denis Bouanga with Romain Hamouma. This is the first substitution made today by Claude Puel.
Wahbi Khazri is replacing Ryad Boudebouz for Saint-Etienne at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 66, Stephanie Frappart awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Can Saint-Etienne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bordeaux's half?
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Stephanie Frappart awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
In the minute 72, Free kick Bordeaux.
Stephanie Frappart signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 73, Claude Puel (Saint-Etienne) is making a third substitution, with Zaydou Youssouf replacing Adil Aouchiche.
Lucas Gourna Douath is replacing Arnaud Nordin for the away team.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
In the minute 74, In Bordeaux, Jimmy Briand (Bordeaux) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bordeaux.
Yvan Neyou scores to make it 1-2 at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 77, Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Wahbi Khazri (Saint-Etienne) has received a yellow card from Stephanie Frappart.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Bordeaux.
Remi Oudin is on a sub for Otavio for Bordeaux.
Stephanie Frappart awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Throw-in high up the field for Saint-Etienne in Bordeaux.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bordeaux close to the penalty box.
In the minute 85, Stephanie Frappart signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Wahbi Khazri (Saint-Etienne) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 87, Yvan Neyou (Saint-Etienne) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Stephanie Frappart.
Saint-Etienne have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Bordeaux drive upfield and Remi Oudin gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Saint-Etienne defender.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Youssouf Sabaly (Bordeaux) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Bordeaux are pushing forward but Remi Oudin's finish is wide of the goal.
Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
Bordeaux needs to be cautious. Saint-Etienne have an attacking throw-in.
Saint-Etienne pushes forward through Romain Hamouma, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Matmut Atlantique.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Stephanie Frappart blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
Claude Puel is making the team's fifth substitution at Matmut Atlantique with Sadio Sow replacing Kolo.
